means: 想( imagine的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I imagined the eyes of the others in the room upon me.
sentence.Network_cn: 我觉得屋里其他人似乎都在盯着我。

sentence.Network_en: Married life was not as idyllic as he had imagined.
sentence.Network_cn: 婚姻生活并不像他想象的那么浪漫美好。

sentence.Network_en: I realised that I must have imagined the whole thing.
sentence.Network_cn: 我意识到大概整件事都是我臆想出来的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: but the reality of this " enemy " is not imagined then close , the upper andlevels has serious industrial chain rule .但现实的情况中这一对“冤家”并没有人们想象的那么亲密，产业链上存在严重的条块割据。
I understand why I imagined being robbed by a man ., 我明白我为什么会想象自己遭到一个男子的抢劫.
i really never imagined myself as a divorcee , you know ., 我从没想过自己会离婚.

list.abs: 郑容和_百度百科 ... Still in Love（ 依然爱你） Imagine( 想象（imagine）） 100103正式改版为 MBC Eco House.
字典中象字的解释 ... (7) 效法[ follow the example of] (9) 想像[ imagine] (4) 象牙的省称[ ivory].
那想象力(Imagination)可就不合格了。世界上有两种人：索取者和给予者。
大学英语精读单词表(第一册) - 豆丁网 ... involve vt. (必须)包括 imagination n. 想像力 learning n. 学习；学问，知识.
英语描写人的形容词汇集_百度文库 ... hypocritical 虚伪的 imaginative 富有想象力的 impartial 公正的.

entry.def: If you imagine something, you think about it and your mind forms a picture or idea of it.

example.ex: He could not imagine a more peaceful scene...
example.tran: 他想象不出比这更祥和的景象。

example.ex: She couldn't imagine living in a place like that...
example.tran: 她无法想象住在那样一个地方。

entry.def: If you imagine that something is the case, you think that it is the case.

example.ex: I imagine you're referring to Jean-Paul Sartre...
example.tran: 我猜你说的是让－保罗·萨特。

example.ex: We tend to imagine that the Victorians were very prim and proper...
example.tran: 我们往往认为维多利亚时代的人们都一本正经,谨言慎行。

entry.def: If you imagine something, you think that you have seen, heard, or experienced that thing, although actually you have not.

example.ex: I realised that I must have imagined the whole thing.
example.tran: 我意识到大概整件事都是我臆想出来的。

sentences.sentence: "the falsehood about some fanciful secret treaties"- F.D.Roosevelt
"to create a notional world for oneself"

auth_sentence.content: I never imagined the battle would be so hard.
auth_sentence.res_content: I never imagined the battle would be so hard.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I never imagined the battle would be so hard.

auth_sentence.content: The future she imagined for herself was equally adventurous.
auth_sentence.res_content: The future she imagined for herself was equally adventurous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The future she imagined for herself was equally adventurous.

auth_sentence.content: This is not how I imagined the great hereafter.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is not how I imagined the great hereafter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is not how I imagined the great hereafter.
